# ========== Unity-specific ==========

[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
MemoryCaptures/

# Autogenerated VS/JetBrains IDE files
.vscode/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.opendb

# Unity cache and generated files
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage
*.log

# Crash and stack trace logs
sysinfo.txt
stacktrace.log

# Exclude hidden folders created by Unity
.DS_Store
*.swp
*.tmp

# Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# ========== Optional (safe to ignore) ==========
# Uncomment below lines if you also want to ignore user-specific settings:
# ProjectSettings/EditorBuildSettings.asset
# ProjectSettings/EditorSettings.asset
# ProjectSettings/ProjectSettings.asset
# ProjectSettings/TagManager.asset

# ========== Git ==========
.gitignore
.gitattributes

# ========== Build artifacts ==========
*.exe
*.app
*.dll
*.so
*.dylib
*.zip
*.tar.gz
*.rar

# ========== Others ==========
# Uncomment to ignore environment-specific settings
# *.env
